attributes.action: Institute a tangible award to all servicemen killed or wounded in the service of this Nation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The creation of an award carrying with it a financial bursary to each and every member of Her Majesty's Armed Forces Killed or Wounded, or in case of death  their dependants, in the service of this Nation, to include those who suffered combatting the blight of Republican Terrorism in the United Kingdom.
